oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hord Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church: front view
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hord Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church
Union Ridge Rd. Near Hord Rd., Wartrace, TN

Color photograph of white church with a small bell cupola at the peak of a metal gable roof. The view of the front of the white frame church shows a simple central door with a window to each side. Steps lead up to the door. A sign that identifies the building is partially illegible.
The congregation that utilized Hord Chapel formed c. 1870. The building was constructed c. 1920 and served as a meeting house until at least the 1990s but appeared to be abandoned by 2009.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Church buildings -- Tennessee
Churches
